00037 #include "egs_library.h"
00038 #include "egs_functions.h"
00039 
00040 #ifdef WIN32
00041 
00042     #include <windows.h>
00043 
00044     #define DLL_HANDLE HMODULE
00045     #define LOAD_LIBRARY(fname) LoadLibrary(fname)
00046     #define FREE_LIBRARY(lib)   FreeLibrary(lib);
00047     #define RESOLVE_SYMBOL(lib,symb) (void *) GetProcAddress(lib,symb)
00048 
00049 #else
00050 
00051     #include <dlfcn.h>
00052 
00053     #define DLL_HANDLE void*
00054     #define LOAD_LIBRARY(fname) dlopen(fname,RTLD_LAZY)
00055     #define FREE_LIBRARY(lib)   !dlclose(lib)
00056     #define RESOLVE_SYMBOL(lib,symb) dlsym(lib,symb)
00057 
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #include <string>
00061 
00062 using namespace std;
00063 
00064 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00065 
00069 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateLibrary {
00070 public:
00071     DLL_HANDLE lib;
00072     string name, fname;
00073     bool au;
00074     EGS_PrivateLibrary(const char *lib_name, const char *path = 0);
00075     ~EGS_PrivateLibrary();
00076     bool load();
00077     void *resolve(const char *symb);
00078     bool unload();
00079     static char fs;
00080     static const char *lib_prefix;
00081     static const char *lib_suffix;
00082 };
00083 
00084 #ifdef WIN32
00085     #ifdef CYGWIN
00086         char EGS_PrivateLibrary::fs = '/';
00087     #else
00088         char EGS_PrivateLibrary::fs = '\\';
00089     #endif
00090     const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_prefix = "";
00091     const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_suffix = ".dll";
00092 #else
00093     char EGS_PrivateLibrary::fs = '/';
00094     const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_prefix = "lib";
00095     const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_suffix = ".so";
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 
00099 EGS_PrivateLibrary::EGS_PrivateLibrary(const char *lib_name, const char *path) {
00100     au = true;
00101     lib = 0;
00102     if (!lib_name) {
00103         egsWarning("EGS_Library::EGS_Library: null library name?\n");
00104         return;
00105     }
00106     name = lib_name;
00107     if (path) {
00108         fname = path;
00109         if (fname[fname.size()-1] != fs) {
00110             fname += fs;
00111         }
00112     }
00113     fname += lib_prefix;
00114     fname += lib_name;
00115     fname += lib_suffix;
00116 #ifdef LIB_DEBUG
00117     egsInformation("EGS_Library::EGS_Library: file name is <%s>\n",fname.c_str());
00118 #endif
00119 }
00120 
00121 EGS_PrivateLibrary::~EGS_PrivateLibrary() {
00122     if (au) {
00123         unload();
00124     }
00125 }
00126 
00127 bool EGS_PrivateLibrary::load() {
00128     if (lib) {
00129         return true;
00130     }
00131     lib = LOAD_LIBRARY(fname.c_str());
00132     /*
00133     if (!lib ) {
00134       const char *tmp = dlerror(); egsWarning("load library: %s\n",tmp);
00135     }
00136     */
00137 #ifdef DLL_DEBUG
00138     egsInformation("In EGS_PrivateLibrary::load(): name = %s lib = 0x%x\n",
00139                    name.c_str(),lib);
00140 #endif
00141     if (lib) {
00142         return true;
00143     }
00144     else {
00145         egsWarning("EGS_Library::load(): failed to load library %s\n",
00146                    fname.c_str());
00147 #ifdef WIN32
00148         egsWarning("  error was: %d\n",GetLastError());
00149 #else
00150         egsWarning("  error was: %s\n",dlerror());
00151 #endif
00152         return false;
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void *EGS_PrivateLibrary::resolve(const char *symb) {
00157     if (!lib) {
00158         if (!load()) {
00159             return 0;
00160         }
00161     }
00162     void *result = RESOLVE_SYMBOL(lib,symb);
00163 #ifdef DLL_DEBUG
00164     egsInformation("In EGS_PrivateLibrary::resolve: symbol = %s result = 0x%x\n",
00165                    symb,result);
00166 #endif
00167     return result;
00168 }
00169 
00170 bool EGS_PrivateLibrary::unload() {
00171     if (!lib) {
00172         return true;
00173     }
00174     bool result = FREE_LIBRARY(lib);
00175     if (result) {
00176         lib = 0;
00177     }
00178     return result;
00179 }
00180 #endif
00181 
00182 EGS_Library::EGS_Library(const char *lib_name, const char *path) {
00183     pl = new EGS_PrivateLibrary(lib_name,path);
00184 }
00185 
00186 EGS_Library::~EGS_Library() {
00187     delete pl;
00188 }
00189 
00190 bool EGS_Library::load() {
00191     return pl->load();
00192 }
00193 
00194 void *EGS_Library::resolve(const char *symb) {
00195     return pl->resolve(symb);
00196 }
00197 
00198 bool EGS_Library::unload() {
00199     return pl->unload();
00200 }
00201 
00202 bool EGS_Library::isLoaded() const {
00203     return (bool) pl->lib;
00204 }
00205 
00206 bool EGS_Library::autoUnload() const {
00207     return pl->au;
00208 }
00209 
00210 void EGS_Library::setUnload(bool u) {
00211     pl->au = u;
00212 }
00213 
00214 const char *EGS_Library::libraryName() const {
00215     return pl->name.c_str();
00216 }
00217 
00218 const char *EGS_Library::libraryFile() const {
00219     return pl->fname.c_str();
00220 }
00221 
00222 void *EGS_Library::resolve(const char *lname, const char *func,
00223                            const char *path) {
00224     EGS_PrivateLibrary p(lname,path);
00225     p.au = false;
00226     if (!p.load()) {
00227         return 0;
00228     }
00229     return p.resolve(func);
00230 }
